sentences.en: All those wounded were innocent victims.
sentences.cn: 所有伤者都是无辜的受害人。

sentences.en: Both groups on either side are just picking off innocent bystanders.
sentences.cn: 对峙双方都只是在瞄准射击无辜的旁观者。

sentences.en: Coleman has never wavered in his claim that he is innocent.
sentences.cn: 科尔曼坚称他是无辜的。

sentences.en: He pleaded innocent by reason of insanity.
sentences.cn: 他以精神不健全为由申辩无罪。

sentences.en: He said the killing of innocent people was inexcusable.
sentences.cn: 他说滥杀无辜是不可原谅的。

sentences.en: He was innocent and the victim of a frame-up.
sentences.cn: 他是清白的，是受人诬陷的。

sentences.en: He's curiously innocent about what this means to other people.
sentences.cn: 关于这对其他人意味着什么，他一无所知，这一点颇不寻常。

sentences.en: I was overwhelmed with longing for those innocent days of early childhood.
sentences.cn: 我内心充满着对纯真的童年时光的怀念。

sentences.en: I was thirteen years old and very innocent.
sentences.cn: 我那时13岁，非常单纯无知。

sentences.en: Ian was a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.cn: 一涉及女性，伊恩就显得极其无知。

sentences.en: Nobody would believe that I was innocent.
sentences.cn: 没人肯相信我是清白的。

sentences.en: She had always regarded Greg as a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.cn: 她过去一直认为格雷格在关于女人方面是一个不可救药的无知者。

sentences.en: The court found him innocent and he was released.
sentences.cn: 法庭判他无罪，他被释放了。

sentences.en: The Pope called for a halt to the shedding of innocent blood.
sentences.cn: 教皇呼吁不要滥杀无辜。

sentences.en: The war was killing innocent women and children.
sentences.cn: 战争夺走了许多无辜妇女和儿童的生命。

sentences.en: They seemed so young and innocent.
sentences.cn: 他们看起来如此少不更事。

sentences.en: Under all the innocent fun, there are hidden dangers, especially for children.
sentences.cn: 在所有简单无害的娱乐项目背后都隐藏着危险，特别是对儿童而言。

sentences.en: We cannot possibly risk so many innocent lives.
sentences.cn: 我们绝不可能拿这么多无辜者的生命冒险。

phrases.tran_cn: 无辜人的血；无辜之血；不死的传说（美国恐怖戏剧爱情片）
无过失之一方；无辜的一方

trans.tran_cn: 无辜的，无罪的，清白的，天真无邪的，无知的
无辜者，头脑简单的人，天真无邪的人
trans.tran_en: An innocent is someone who is innocent
